title: Describe something you own which is very important to you.
subtitle: You should say:
questions: - How long you have had it
- Explain why it is important to you

title: Describe a family member you spend a lot of time with.
subtitle: You should say:
questions: - What you like to do together?
- What kind of person they are
- Explain why you spend a lot of time with them

title: Describe a period of history you are interested in.
subtitle: You should say:
questions: - When did you first learn about it
- Explain why you find it interesting
